body_html:
I am a C/C++ programmer who wanted to play with tf, not cats, not puppies, but let's say a set of strings and floats. I googled the csv and tf for hours, what I found is 1) a lot of talk about what a neuron and what the meaning of the word "deep". Then 2) a lot of hugely complicated python programs with flowers and such, using data I don't want. And some 3) short and incomplete or 4) long and complicated documents that does not say how to define a simple network, read the data from a txt file and print the results.

It is extremely frustrating.

body:
I am a C/C++ programmer who wanted to play with tf, not cats, not puppies, but let's say a set of strings and floats. I googled the csv and tf for hours, what I found is 1) a lot of talk about what a neuron and what the meaning of the word "deep". Then 2) a lot of hugely complicated python programs with flowers and such, using data I don't want. And some 3) short and incomplete or 4) long and complicated documents that does not say how to define a simple network, read the data from a txt file and print the results.

It is extremely frustrating.
